name: Slimy escape (stak134)
description:
Warning: there are a lot of slimes in this game!

Tower defense game made for the Quarantine Jam in 3 days.

The slimes and turrets are in sync with the music. 4 different songs to play with, unlocked automatically by killing slimes.

You can build/upgrade 3 different types of turrets. 

You also have a bomb (button in the top left of the screen) to manually kill slimes!

If enough slimes reaches the end, you lose!

Escape - Pause menu

WASD - move camera

Hold right click + move mouse - rotate camera

Credits:

Textures: textures.com

Models by us

Songs:

  1. Samuel Carnie & Snapick - Awakening
  2. MBB - Wake Up (edited)
  3. Euonia & Sappheiros - Ashes (edited)
  4. Kobaryo - Parallel Terminal

Game made by Stack, BlackStartX, Miko
